body.name: Yaheetech Wooden Bathroom Floor Cabinet, Side Storage Organizer Cabinet with 4 Drawers & Double Doors, Freestanding Entryway Storage Unit Console Table, Bathroom Furniture Home Decor, White
features: 【Sturdy Construction】This free-standing cabinet is built with a solid MDF structure with a high load capacity（tabletop: 40kg / 88.2lb; drawer: 4kg / 8.8lb; shelf: 15kg / 33.1lb）and meets your basic storage requirements.

【Multiple Tiers Storage】A open tabletop, 4 drawers, and a 3-tier cabinet make multiple tiers for meeting your different storage needs, organizing your everyday household products well, and keeping your odds and ends in order.

【Adjustable Height】The upper cupboard shelf can be easily adjusted up, down, or out in 3 heights (28.5 cm / 11.2″; 22 cm / 8.7″; 15.7 cm / 6.2″) according to the different sizes of your bathroom items.

【Versatility】This versatile cabinet can work well for your own storage needs, like organizing different items like cosmetics, toiletries, towels, toilet paper, books, or magazines. You can also give it as a thoughtful gift to your beloved ones who are (re)decorating their homes.

【All-matching Design】This storage cabinet showcases a sleek rectangular design with unique straight lines on smooth panel doors, making it an aesthetically-pleasing fit for any home décor from traditional to modern.
body.description: Yaheetech Storage Cabinet Large Storage Space Design Specifications: Color: White Materials: MDF, Metal Hardware Overall Dimensions: 32″ L × 12″ W × 33″ H Tabletop: 32″ L × 12″ W Drawer: 9.6″ L × 9″ W × 4″ H Adjustable Shelf Heights (Upper Shelf): 11.2″; 8.7″; 6.2″ Adjustable Shelf: 19.5″ W × 10″ H Distance from Bottom to Fixed Shelf: 11.2″ Maximum Weight Capacity Tabletop: 88.2 lb Drawer: 8.8 lb Shelf: 33.1 lb Net Weight (assembled product weight): 51.8 lb Gross Weight (product in the box) 56.7 lb Note: Please allow a 1/2″ measurement tolerance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Furniture Organizer for Bathroom, Wooden Bathroom Floor Cabinet, Side Storage Cabinet with 4 Drawers and Double Doors If extra toiletries and spare towels are piled up in your bathroom ensemble, having a spacious storage cabinet can help you hide all the clutter behind the door and out of sight. This 32″ L × 12″ W × 33″ H cabinet has 4 no-handle sliding drawers and 1 roomy cupboard with an adjustable shelf. The adjustable shelf, including three heights ( 11.2″; 8.7″; 6.2″), allows you to keep items of different sizes behind the doors. Once you have it, the storage space in your bathroom, kitchen, and sitting room will instantly expand.

Yaheetech Storage Cabinet Large Storage Space Design Specifications: Color: White Materials: MDF, Metal Hardware Overall Dimensions: 32″ L × 12″ W × 33″ H Tabletop: 32″ L × 12″ W Drawer: 9.6″ L × 9″ W × 4″ H Adjustable Shelf Heights (Upper Shelf): 11.2″; 8.7″; 6.2″ Adjustable Shelf: 19.5″ W × 10″ H Distance from Bottom to Fixed Shelf: 11.2″ Maximum Weight Capacity Tabletop: 88.2 lb Drawer: 8.8 lb Shelf: 33.1 lb Net Weight (assembled product weight): 51.8 lb Gross Weight (product in the box) 56.7 lb Note: Please allow a 1/2″ measurement tolerance. All-matching Design √ Easy Setup √ Safe to Use √

Three Optional Heights Adjust the height of shelves according to the items. Metal Knob Round design and metal material, bring comfortable feeling for you. Metal Hinges Fine metal hinges with smooth open/close and good durability.

Premium MDF Board Made of high quality MDF board, harmless and suitable for long-term use. Magnetic Door Design Easy to open/close, all-around protecting storage items. Protective Covering We apply a waterproof and moisture-proof coating process to the surface, making it resistant to moisture and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This kit was amazingly well organized. I was truly impressed. Ive put together many of these over the yrs and none has been so well organized! That being said it did take all of 3 hrs to put together but i managed it just fine all by myself bcuz it was so well organized. Just lay everything out and follow instructions. The instructions are all illustrations. No words. But that was fine. The illustrations were good and easy to follow. Now as for lasting a long time........i cant say im expecting that even though it was well made. The materials are just not something i expect to last the test of time. 2 things i didnt like. The 2nd shelf is not adjustable and the screws for the drawers did not tighten. I was careful not to strip them. They just never tightened up. Dont know what is wrong there but eventually the drawers will loosen on me bcuz of that. Overall im happy and i like the cabinet. It looks very nice in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a perfect fit in my bathroom! Plenty of room to hold all my towels, facecloths, hand towels, and hair products. Made well! Although it said takes an hour to put together, it took my hubby 3 hours! Love this cabinet!

reviews.reviewerName: Cara Likes To ReadCara Likes To Read
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, but I'm less than impressed with one thing...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought three pieces from this company to redo my teenagers' bathroom, and of the three - the other two of which I am very happy with, also skein in this video - this is the one I'm least impressed by.I really do love the esthetic for what it is, and the size and storage for the bathroom are just fine. The problem is with the sturdiness.After assembly, as I pointout in the attached picture and describe it in the video, one of the sides is not securely anchored. It is simply slotted into place with a number of dowels, and this means at every time you pull the drawers open or closed, or try to move the cabinet, it starts to pull apart on that side.If it pulls too far apart, it makes the drawers difficult to open and close, as they fall off the tracks. This issue also meant that when I assembled it in a different room than I intended to use it in, it was really hard to move it in there once it was conplete. I couldn't just pick it up and move it, as I would have fallen apart.I ended up setting it on furniture sliders to get it from one room to the other even though it's not extremely heavy and I could have otherwise moved it on my own (probably jist under 50#.)Even with the furniture sliders, I had to slide it by applying pressure at the base, because if I applied pressure at the top it would still fall apart on that side that I'm pointing to in the picture.Anyway, having said all of that, I really am fine with it for what I needed it for, which was just a refresh to my teenagers' bathroom and a pleasing esthetic overall, which I think it does achieve.The assembly did take me a while, so be prepared for that, but I was able to accomplish it all by myself (although I did have one of my kids hold the cabinet doors in place when I attach the hinges… it could have been done with just one person, but was easier with someone else to hold them in position.)Initially, I was shipped the wrong piece - the black version of this instead of the white - but I will say that the sellers were incredibly responsive and extremely easy to work with, and replaced it very quickly. In fact, I think I got the replacement shipped to me much faster than the original piece arrived 🤣🤣🤣.Overall, I'm torn between a 3-star and a 4-star rating, but I'm going to go ahead and go with 4-stars because I am happy with how it looks in the bathroom as a whole... but I may come back and downgrade that if the way it constantly pulls apart on the drawer side becomes too annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we were looking for!
reviews.reviewText: This little cabinet is absolutely perfect for where we wanted to put it. We needed a shallow cabinet (it’s 12 inches deep by 31” wide by 33” high) with storage for nails/makeup/hair supplies. This one has drawers to organize all of those and a cabinet with shelves. It’s a nice height and we dressed it up with a tile topper and hung a front and back lit mirror over it and it looks fabulous. It’s very sturdy and good quality for the price. I am not super handy and it only took me an hour to put it together. The instructions are were straight forward and easy to follow. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good sturdy shelf. But it's not as tall as I thought it would be. With that said. The drawer are not deep. But I still like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Really bad chemical smell - can’t get rid of
reviews.reviewText: It would be a nice little storage unit but the chemical smell is so bad it’s unusable. I’ve had it assembled and airing out for over 3 weeks and it still smells so badly of chemicals. I’ve tried wiping it down, cleaning spray, airing it out - nothing has worked. I bought it to store towels but the towels start smelling extremely strongly of the chemicals after being in the cabinet a short while and I had to rewash all of them. It was that bad. The smell saturated the towels which were dry and clean. This is after being cleaned and aired out for two weeks. I’m so disappointed because this was basically a huge waste of money. I can’t even return it because it’s fully assembled and I threw the box away thinking it just needed to air out. I will probably end up donating or disposing of this because the smell really is that bad that it’s unusable. Huge waste of money. Really wish I hadn’t bought this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality and looks great in my bathroom. It arrived quickly and was packed securely so there was no damage. Easy to assemble - good instructions. Took me about 2 1/2 hours. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cabinet measurements are not accurate
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this cabinet because I wanted something bigger than I had. Cabinet measurements are not fully accurate. The sliders that the drawers are on are plastic so they make a rubbing sound when opening. Overall, disappointed in the quality. Good thing it's for my laundry room.
